references.paper_title: A review of deep learning for video captioning
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning techniques for video captioning, which is the central topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: SPICE: semantic propositional image caption evaluation
references.reason: This paper introduces SPICE, a metric used for evaluating video captioning models, which is directly relevant to the evaluation methodology employed in the current work.
This paper introduces CIDEr, another important metric for evaluating video captioning models, and its inclusion demonstrates the significance of quantitative evaluation in the field.

references.paper_title: Sequence to sequence - video to text
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on video captioning using sequence-to-sequence models, providing a foundational approach that has influenced many subsequent methods.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces a technique for improving the performance of video captioning by using pre-trained vision-language models, which is a core approach in the current work.
